member.name: T:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController
member.summary: MVC Controller for /machine requests

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController})
member.summary: Create a new controller instance

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.Get
member.summary: WS /machine Provide WebSocket for continuous model updates. This is primarily used to keep DWC2 up-to-date
member.returns: WebSocket, HTTP status code: (400) Bad request

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.Status
member.summary: GET /machine/status Retrieve the full object model as JSON.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (200) Machine object model as application/json (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.DoCode(System.String)
member.summary: POST /machine/code Execute a plain G/M/T-code from the request body and return the G-code response when done.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (200) G-Code response as text/plain (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.DownloadFile(System.String)
member.summary: GET /machine/file/{filename} Download the specified file.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (200) File content (404) File not found (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.UploadFile(System.String)
member.summary: PUT /machine/file/{filename} Upload a file from the HTTP body and create the subdirectories if necessary.
member.param: Destination of the file to upload
member.returns: HTTP status code: (201) File created (500) Generic error occurred (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.GetFileinfo(System.String)
member.summary: GET /machine/fileinfo/{filename} Retrieve file info from the specified G-code file.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (200) File info as application/json (404) File not found (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.DeleteFileOrDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: DELETE /machine/file/{filename} Delete the given file or directory.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (204) File or directory deleted (404) File not found (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.MoveFileOrDirectory(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Move a file or directory from a to b
member.returns: HTTP status code: (204) File or directory moved (404) File or directory not found (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.GetFileList(System.String)
member.summary: GET /machine/directory/{directory} Get a file list of the specified directory
member.returns: HTTP status code: (200) File list as application/json (404) Directory not found (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.MachineController.CreateDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: PUT /machine/directory/{directory} Create the given directory.
member.returns: HTTP status code: (204) Directory created (500) Generic error (502) Incompatible DCS version (503) DCS is unavailable

member.name: T:DuetWebServer.Controllers.WebSocketController
member.summary: This class takes care of WebSocket-based communication. At the moment it is only used to provide continuous machine model updates.

member.name: M:DuetWebServer.Controllers.WebSocketController.Process(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket,System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Deal with a newly opened WebSocket. A client may receive one of the WS codes: (1001) Endpoint unavailable (1003) Invalid command (1011) Internal error
